en-US.title: 'Hello, world!'
en-US.description: Create and deploy your first Windows 10 IoT Core app

en-US.title: 'Hello, blinky!'
en-US.description: A 'Hello, world' sample to control an LED from a breadboard

en-US.title: 'Hello, blinky!' background service
en-US.description: Create an app with no UI that toggles an LED on devices running Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: 'Hello, Cloud!'
en-US.description: Create an app to talk to the Azure cloud using Azure IoT Hub

en-US.title: App installer
en-US.description: Install and deploy an app on Windows IoT Core

en-US.title: App Service Blinky
en-US.description: Sample app service that allows one background application to control an LED as an app service, and the other background application to blink the LED.

en-US.title: App Service Shared Notepad
en-US.description: Sample app service with 2 clients.  One client writes notepad messages.  The other client reads notepad messages and displays them.

en-US.title: Azure weather station
en-US.description: Build a weather station application to demonstrate the capabilities of Power BI and Azure Active Directory

en-US.title: Bluetooth low energy GATT
en-US.description: Learn how to work with Bluetooth Low Energy devices using the GATT profile and a TI CC2541 SensorTag

en-US.title: Bluetooth Serial
en-US.description: Send and receive messages over Bluetooth serial

en-US.title: Cognitive Services
en-US.description: Access and use the Cognitive Services API inside a C# UWP App

en-US.title: Device I/O controller
en-US.description: Use CreateFile() and DeviceIoControl() to access custom devices from UWP.

en-US.title: Digital sign
en-US.description: Create a basic digital sign and learn how to work with multimedia

en-US.title: Driver sample
en-US.description: Create and interact with a universal driver on devices running Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: External process launcher
en-US.description: Use Windows.System.ProcessLauncher API to launch external executable programs from your UWP app

en-US.title: GPIO OneWire
en-US.description: Create an app that uses GPIO to read from the DHT11, a temperature and humidity sensor that uses a single-wire protocol

en-US.title: GpioTestTool
en-US.description: A command line utility to access GPIO.

en-US.title: IoT Core Default App
en-US.description: Create a UWP app that provides a device-management experience for Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: IoT Home App
en-US.description: Create a UWP app to demonstrate navigation between multiple app using protocol uri scheme

en-US.title: IoT Startup App
en-US.description: Create a UWP Startup app to list and launch apps installed on the IoT Core System

en-US.title: I2C accelerometer
en-US.description: Connect an accelerometer to your device and read data from it

en-US.title: I2C port expander
en-US.description: Connect a port expander to read the status of a tactile switch and control an LED

en-US.title: I2cTestTool
en-US.description: A command line utility to access I2C.

en-US.title: IoT browser
en-US.description: Create a simple web browser

en-US.title: OpenCV
en-US.description: Use OpenCV to run facial and body recognition on a photo

en-US.title: Push button
en-US.description: Make an LED blink with the push of a button

en-US.title: Potentiometer sensor
en-US.description: Read values from a rotary potentiometer and output data to an LED

en-US.title: RGB LED
en-US.description: Create an app that uses the Raspberry Pi 2 to toggle an RGB LED.

en-US.title: SPI accelerometer
en-US.description: Connect an accelerometer to your device and read data from it

en-US.title: SPI display
en-US.description: Write lines of text to an LED display

en-US.title: SpiTestTool
en-US.description: A command line utility to access SPI.

en-US.title: Shift register
en-US.description: Connect an 8-bit serial-in, parallel-out shift register to your device to toggle eight LED's

en-US.title: Serial UART
en-US.description: Communicate between a desktop and an IoT device over a serial interface

en-US.title: TPM Device Test
en-US.description: Write an app that can authenticate to Azure while protecting the security-sensitive information on the device

en-US.title: Video Capture
en-US.description: Create an app that records video to file, plays video from file.

en-US.title: Webcam app
en-US.description: Create an app that initializes a web cam, takes pictures, and records video and audio.

en-US.title: OneNote cloud services
en-US.description: Learn how to use http messages to GET and POST OneNote pages in Wiring

en-US.title: RGB pixel strip
en-US.description: Learn how to use an RGB pixel strip in Wiring

en-US.title: LCD text display
en-US.description: Deploy and debug an Arduino Wiring sketch to control text on an LCD screen

en-US.title: Stepper motor
en-US.description: Deploy and debug an Arduino Wiring sketch to control a stepper motor

en-US.title: Lightning.Providers - Blinky background service
en-US.description: Demonstrating the use of Microsoft.IoT.Lightning.Providers in UWP apps

en-US.title: Lightning.Providers - Blinky
en-US.description: Demonstrating the use of Microsoft.IoT.Lightning.Providers in UWP apps

en-US.title: Lightning.Providers - Weather station
en-US.description: Demonstrating the use of Microsoft.IoT.Lightning.Providers in UWP apps

en-US.title: Lightning.Providers - SPI display
en-US.description: Demonstrating the use of Microsoft.IoT.Lightning.Providers in UWP apps

en-US.title: DC motor controller
en-US.description: Control DC motors using a Windows IoT Core enabled device!

en-US.title: Memory status monitor
en-US.description: Create a console app that monitors memory usage on devices running Windows 10 IoT Core

en-US.title: Wi-Fi connector
en-US.description: Discover and connect to a WiFi network from a UWP app using Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiAdapter API

en-US.title: HID Injection driver
en-US.description: Build a driver for IoT Core and use HID Injection to inject touch, keyboard or mouse events.

en-US.title: NFC for IoT
en-US.description: How to use the NFC APIs on IoT Core.

en-US.title: Speech translator
en-US.description: Translate your speech to different languages.

en-US.title: Temperature and force sensor
en-US.description: Control a basic temperature and force sensor.
